about_the_game:
Story


Dynacat's home has been invaded by an army of robots who are draining energy from the land and storing it in the form of magic crystals. Follow Dynacat on an adventure to fight back against the robots and protect the land from withering.

Gameplay


Dynacat is a fast-paced 3D platforming game with an isometric perspective. Speed through stages by using platforms, springs and other stage elements to overcome obstacles. If you're going fast enough you can even run on walls!

Dynacat's magic tether can attach to many things with a variety of different effects. Use the tether while in the air to quickly dash toward enemies and other targets.

Stages


Dynacat traverses three kinds of stages:

In Action Stages the main objective is to reach the goal by traversing an obstacle course. Each action stage has a variety of paths, some are faster, some have secrets and some will let you accomplish secondary objectives such as defeating a number of enemies or getting a certain amount of style points.

In Spheron Stages you must defeat the Spherons, the enemy leaders. Identify their weak points and skillfully traverse obstacles to reach them.

Unlock Special Stages by recovering enough crystals in an action stage. In these stages the goal is to collect a number of energy orbs and reach the goal within a time limit. Complete all the special stages for a special reward!

Game Modes

The game has three difficulty modes:

  • On Normal difficulty, you can return to previously completed stages at any time.
  • In Easy mode, you can traverse stages without taking damage.
  • In Hard mode, stages are played in order and losing all lives will send you back to the beginning of the game.

Story

In Spheron Stages you must defeat the Spherons, the enemy leaders. Identify their weak points and skillfully traverse obstacles to reach them.

Unlock Special Stages by recovering enough crystals in an action stage. In these stages the goal is to collect a number of energy orbs and reach the goal within a time limit. Complete all the special stages for a special reward!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20, Debian 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Required packages: libopenal

name: Dynacat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2450M 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires OpenAL
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Save Dynacat's home from the incoming army of robots in this fast-paced 3D platforming adventure. Dash to the goal, find all the secrets, defeat enemies and earn points by doing it all in style!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
